ABOUT_ME_INTRO: Hi, I’m a certified Frontend Developer who is passionate about creating websites and applications that make people's lives easier. My journey began when I watched a friend code and was fascinated by how web development allows us to create something that others use every day to solve their problems. Since then, I’ve been driven by the idea of making a positive impact through my work.
ABOUT_ME_FIRST_TEXT: I love building websites and apps, and it makes me incredibly happy when everything works exactly as I envisioned it. I have experience with Angular, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript, and I’m always excited to improve my skills.
ABOUT_ME_SECOND_TEXT: I enjoy working in a team because I can learn from others and grow while contributing my creativity, problem-solving skills, and attention to detail. My biggest motivation is my kids, I want to be a role model for them by continuously learning and taking on new challenges.
ABOUT_ME_THIRD_TEXT: I am open to new career opportunities and look forward to working on diverse projects to deepen my experience and make a positive contribution.
MY_SKILLS_FIRST_TEXT: I have gained experience in building projects with different frontend technologies and concepts.
MY_SKILLS_THIRD_TEXT: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
TOOLTIP_INTEREST_IN_LEARNING: I have a special interest in learning
Explore a selection of my work here - In: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
JOIN_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
POLLO_LOCO_DESCRIPTION: A 2D platform game where players control a character to avoid obstacles and defeat enemies.
TESTIMONIAL_1: Oleg always impresses with his calmness and composure, even in challenging situations. He loves to tackle complex tasks and is tireless in finding a solution, no matter how long it takes. His ability to quickly understand things and explain them clearly makes him a valuable member of any team.
TESTIMONIAL_2: Oleg was a good team player in our group project. He completed his tasks very independently and satisfactorily. His communication in facing challenges was pleasant and solution-oriented.
CONTACT_ME_MESSAGE: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas, and contributing to your projects with my work.
NAME_ERROR: Your first and last name is required

FEEDBACK: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you soon.
CONTENT_RESPONSIBILITY_TEXT: The contents of our pages were created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the contents. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to general laws pursuant to § 7 para.1 DDG. However, pursuant to §§ 8 to 10 DDG, we are not obligated as a service provider to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity. Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the point in time at which knowledge of a specific infringement is obtained. Upon becoming aware of such legal violations, we will remove this content immediately.
LINK_RESPONSIBILITY_TEXT: Our offer contains links to external websites of third parties, over whose contents we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot accept any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the contents of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal contents were not recognizable at the time of linking. However, permanent content control of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a violation. Upon becoming aware of violations, we will remove such links immediately.
DATA_PROTECTION_TEXT: The use of our website is usually possible without providing personal data. Where personal data (e.g., name, address, or email address) is collected on our pages, this is always on a voluntary basis, as far as possible. These data will not be disclosed to third parties without your explicit consent.
INTERNET_TRANSMISSION_WARNING: We point out that data transmission over the Internet (e.g., when communicating via email) can have security vulnerabilities. A complete protection of the data against access by third parties is not possible.
UNSOLICITED_EMAIL_WARNING: The use of contact data published in the context of the legal notice obligation by third parties for sending unsolicited advertising and information materials is hereby expressly prohibited. The operators of the pages expressly reserve the right to take legal action in the event of unsolicited advertising, such as spam emails.
